Some of the minigames : the chifoumi (stone / paper / scissors), the teaser (reconstruct an image by pushing boxes), memory (remember a sequence of buttons as long as possible) and much more. A multi mode allows you to compete with friends, up to 4 players.

game.name: Petz Fantasy: Moonlight Magic
game.desc: For the first time ever, discover and take care of your very own fantasy pets. Enter a world of fantasy where you discover mysterious eggs that hatch into cute fantasy creatures in Petz Fantasy: Moonlight Magic. Each fantasy creature has its own personality, surprising reactions and magical powers. Help them grow by caring for them, feeding them and teaching them their magical powers. Above all, keep your fantasy Petz a secret from your parents!

game.name: Petz : Nursery
game.desc: In Ubisoft's Petz Nursery, players can care for and bond with a variety of the cutest newborn animals, from dogs to polar bears. Help them grow into strong and healthy animals!

game.name: Mahjong - Eine Reise Um Die Welt
Naruto - Ninja Destiny II - European Version
game.desc: Naruto Shippuden: Ninja Destiny 2 features fast paced Naruto Shippuden 3D fighting action with the addition of an all-new Quest Mode, new characters, jutsu and a storyline based on the Naruto Shippuden animated series. The title also features wireless multiplayer gameplay, offering Naruto fans and newcomers to the series competitive 3D fighting on the Nintendo DS.

game.name: Heroes of Hellas 2 : Olympia
game.desc: Heroes of Hellas 2: Olympia is a puzzle game available on DS. The player must fight against a vile demon while building a new city. To do this, he collects money by aligning at least three gems of the same color on various game boards. Special powers can be unlocked for greater efficiency.

game.name: Madagascar 3 : Europe's Most Wanted
game.desc: In Madagascar 3: The Video Game, players of all ages will get to experience the adventures of Alex the Lion, Marty the Zebra, Gloria the Hippo, and Melman the Giraffe trying to find a way home through the perfect cover: a traveling circus. Travel across Europe and promote the circus by completing missions and putting on an amazing mini-game based show to take the gang back to the states!

game.name: Pferd & Pony - Die Reitakademie
game.desc: Real Stories: Cheval Academy for DS is part of a range of games that will bring many adventures and experiences. It is here in the academy of the most beautiful horses that the game will take the players to complete many tests (brush your horse, ride it in different environments, etc.).

game.path: ./Pferd & Pony - Die Reitakademie - Das Entscheidende Turnier (Europe).zip
game.name: Pferd & Pony - Die Reitakademie - Das Entscheidende Turnier
game.desc: Die Reitakademie heißt dich erneut Willkommen! Freue dich auf neue Mitschüler und alte Bekannte. Zeige deine Fähigkeiten im Spring-, Dressur und Westernreiten. Pflege und trainiere dein Pferd mit Nintendo DS-Touchpen und Mikrofon für den entscheidenden Wettkampf. Auch abseits der Reitstrecke wird es nie langweilig: Um die Akademie mit vereinten Kräften vor dem großen Unheil zu bewahren, musst du den alten Zwist mit der Zickel-Clique vergessen. Stürze dich ins Abenteuer!
game.image: ./media/screenshot/Pferd & Pony - Die Reitakademie - Das Entscheidende Turnier (Europe).png

game.path: ./Pferd & Pony - Mein Gestuet - Ein Leben fuer die Pferde (Europe).zip
game.name: Pferd & Pony - Mein Gestuet - Ein Leben fuer die P
game.image: ./media/screenshot/Pferd & Pony - Mein Gestuet - Ein Leben fuer die Pferde (Europe).png

game.name: Pferdefreunde Puzzle - Echter Puzzlespass Fuer Unterwegs
Pic Pic
game.desc: Pic Pic is a puzzle game with three different challenges. "Labyrinth" consists in finding the exit, "Drawing" in connecting figures of the same value, and "MagiPic" in shading a given number of boxes. The three challenges rewards the player with a small image once the puzzle has been solved.

game.name: Pinball Deluxe
game.desc: This is a pinball simulation game in which players control bumpers, hit targets, and guide balls through various triggering switches. Players are rewarded bonus points for hitting sports-themed targets that glide across the machine.

game.name: Pippi Longstocking
game.desc:
Pippi Longstocking for 3DS is a 3d Puzzle/Adventure game based on Astrid Lindgrens wonderful stories about the strongest girl in the world Pippi Longstocking. In the game the player gets the opportunity to meet and help well-known characters, solve problems in Pippis own way and play together with friends in new and exciting adventures. The art style in the game is a digital interpretation of the classical illustrations by Ingrid Nyman.
Join Pippi and her friends in an all new adventure!

game.name: Playmobil : Top Agents
game.desc: Playmobil Agents lands the player straight in a classical Sixties Spy Thriller setting where the Good Guys, a.k.a. "Spy Team" fight Dr. Evil and his "Robo Gang" (the bad guys) as they battle for world domination.

game.name: Pokémon: Black Version 2
game.desc:
Made for Nintendo DS, this game is a sequel to the fifth generation of Pokemon games, known as Pokemon Black & Pokemon White.
Return to the captivating Unova region two years after the events of the original Pokemon Black Version and Pokemon White Version games -- the first time in the core Pokemon game series that a storyline has continued from one game to another. Players can explore new areas, discover Gyms with new leaders and see how everything has changed in the last two years.

game.name: Pokémon: White Version
game.desc: Pokemon Black Version and Pokemon White Version feature new Pokemon that players can catch, train and battle as they progress through the game, and some Pokemon can only be caught in one version of the game. For example, the Legendary Pokemon Reshiram can only be caught in Pokemon Black Version, while the Legendary Pokemon Zekrom can only be caught in Pokemon White Version. Additionally, the two games feature different areas for the first time in the series, with the game world of Pokemon Black Version featuring a unique metropolitan area called Black City, and a lush, green area named White Forest only found in Pokemon White Version. Pokemon Black Version and Pokemon White Version also mark the first time in a Pokemon video game that the seasons will change in the game world. Certain Pokemon appear more frequently during different seasons, and players can only access some areas during a specific season.

game.name: Pony Life
game.desc: Pony Life for Nintendo DS is a simulation game that lets you take care of a pony from birth to adulthood. Create a unique pony among a multitude of possibilities and enjoy long rides in beautiful landscapes or train them to make him a champion. Progress with your pony and earn numerous rewards to kit them out in the best way.

game.name: Pop Town
game.desc: Welcome to Pop Town, the grooviest town on the planet, the dance floor of champions. Available on DS, Pop Town invites you to play as Elvira, a funky young girl with a passion for music, dance and fashion. Explore the city and take part in dance competitions through games that highlight your sense of rhythm. The title contains thirty-six songs and lets you choose from one hundred and ten elements to customize Elvira's outfit at will.

game.name: 郵差帕特
game.desc: Postman Pat is an action / adventure game for DS. From the cartoon of the same name, accompany Pat and Jess, his black and white cat, on a great adventure! About ten mini-games are present to entertain you, also leaving you the choice of the character you want to play! All of these games use the functionality of the DS, be it the stylus or the microphone.

game.name: Postman Pat : Special Delivery Service
game.desc: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service is a game based on the popular television show of the same name, developed by French studio, Uacari. The game is a collection of 15 mini-games, which feature characters and locations from the TV show. The mini-games include word search, pairs, hangman and spot the difference.

game.name: Powershot Pinball Constructor
game.desc: Powershot Pinball Constructor for DS is not only a classic pinball game, it also offers a table editor. You can therefore play classic games on a variety of grounds, but also let your imagination run wild and create the table of your dreams. Discover secret areas, mini-games, share your creations with your friends and participate in multi-party games thanks to the multi-card game.

game.name: Princess Isabella - A Witch's Curse
game.desc: The game begins with Princess Isabella returning home from a trip to discover that an evil curse has been put upon her castle. The curse has placed evil in every room and turned everyone inside the castle into mirrors. With the help of a fairy friend, players must step into Princess Isabella's shoes and battle against an evil witch to lift the curse.

game.name: Princess Melody
game.desc: Princess Melody on DS takes you on a magical adventure where the princess and her three friends, the fairies of music, try to save a sinking world. A witch has stolen all the melodies in this world and you have to alternate rhythm and song games to get them back.

game.path: ./Prinzessin Lillifee Puzzle - Echter Puzzlespass fuer Unterwegs (Europe).zip
game.name: Princess Lillifee Puzzle - Echter Puzzlespass fuer Unterwegs
Puzzle Kingdoms
game.desc:
Puzzle Kingdoms is a RPG game using tile matching mini-games as the combat system of the battles, in a similar fashion to Puzzle Quest, another puzzle-based RPG with fantasy themes released in 2007 by the same developers. Instead of swapping adjacent tiles to create groups of three or more like in the earlier title, the main gameplay mechanic this time is to move columns and rows to match tiles.
The player controls a hero character, moving between waypoints in an isometric map similar to the ones found on the Heroes of Might and Magic series. The game is divided in campaigns, where the objective is to invade and defeat all the main cities from a kingdom to conquer it. The hero character levels up automatically after winning a number of battles, adding new abilities and fresh spells to the available arsenal.
The battle screen has a grid of tiles occupying most of the central space, with the troops of the two fighting armies lined up at the sides. Each row and column has buttons to move them, and the combatants take turns trying to make matches of three or more of the same type to charge their troops and increase the damage against the enemy when attacking. When one of the troops is fully charged, an attack button lights up at the top of the screen to unleash an assault against the opposite forces. Attack tiles have a similar effect, starting the maneuver when three or more of them are lined up on the grid.
The troopers have attack and defense statistics that determine the outcome of the attacks, with the alignment with the board colors and terrain effects increasing or decreasing their points. The player can retreat, a useful strategy when the battle is practically lost, allowing the remaining troops to be saved. There are four slots below the troop lines for spells, that can be used to change the number of specific tiles on the grid, alter statistics and help in other ways. They are charged by making matches with tiles of their colors.
New troops can be recruited on the outposts, with money received after winning the battles. Shrines, taverns, dungeons and other special buildings have mini-games, with multiple goals like clearing the grid on a set number of turns, making a series of matches within a time limit and other similar challenges. Completing these bonus stages gives new items and upgrades.

game.name: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
game.desc: Joining Raa Raa on his vocal voyage of discovery are Huffty the elephant, Topsy the giraffe, Crocky the crocodile, Zebby the zebra and Ooo Ooo the monkey. Together this merry band of friends are learning that they can have a lot more fun if they use their communication skills - sounds, gestures, facial expressions and best of all, words!

game.name: Rayman Ds
game.desc: The character with no arms and no legs makes his debut on the Nintendo DS. Rayman must defeat the pirates who have enslaved his world. As Rayman, you'll travel through magical worlds where you can explore waterfalls, sea caves, and pirate hideouts. Master Rayman's special moves to progress through each challenging level. The DS's bottom screen let you monitor your progress, track your lums, and keep an eye on Rayman's health.

game.name: Ready, Steady, Cook: The Game
game.desc: Ready, Steady, Cook: The Game, is based off of the British cooking show, in which members of the public have to cook a meal from a certain budget of random ingredients. They are split into two teams, the Red Tomatoes and the Green Peppers and both have a celebrity chief to help them out. After they have cooked the meal, the audience then votes for who they thought did the best meal. The game also follows the same routine, but lacks any celebrity appearances.

game.name: Real Adventures - Wild Horses - The Quest for the
Real Crimes : Jack the Ripper
game.desc: Real Crimes: Jack the Ripper is a puzzle and hidden object game available for Nintendo DS. In the heart of a London city plunged in terror, you will have to solve the puzzles you will be confronted with to put an end to the atrocities of the famous Ripper.

game.name: Real Crimes : The Unicorn Killer
game.desc: Real Crimes: The Unicorn Killer for DS is a hidden object search game. Based on a true story, this one proposes to hunt down Ira Einhorn, a former peace activist convicted of the murder of his girlfriend. The player plays Jennifer Lourdes, a detective who must search for and apprehend the assassin on the loose in Europe. This one is to conduct the investigation in order to find evidence and objects of all kinds leading to the killer.

game.name: Real Stories : My Baby World
game.desc: Real Stories : Babies sur DS met la joueuse dans la peau d'une apprentie nounou qui devoir s'occuper de huit petits chérubins en veillant à ce qu'ils ne manquent de rien, qu'ils restent propres et qu'ils aient moult calins. Il faudra chanter une berceuse ou encore donner un bain. Les parents satisfaits offriront des objets pour décorer la crèche.

game.name: Red Bull BC One
game.desc: Inspired by the eponymous breakdance tournament, Red Bull BC One on DS offers you the chance to show your dancing and acrobatic skills. To perform one of the 70 tricks present in the game, you have to use the stylus to connect light points before the time runs out. Red Bull BC One offers many customization options for your character and nearly 35 different audio tracks to accompany your choreographies. A multiplayer mode is also included.

game.name: Restaurant Tycoon
game.desc: Do you have what it takes to run the best restaurant in town? Can you lead your restaurant to greatness? Play Restaurant Tycoon to find out! Just like in real life, Restaurant Tycoon is all about making sure to keep your restaurant running: cooking and serving the tastiest and sensational courses, managing your staff, developing new products and choosing marketing strategies. If you love good food, Tycoon games or organising things, this challenging and comprehensive game will keep you busy for many hours.

game.name: Retro Arcade Toppers
game.desc: Retro Arcade Toppers is a compilation of arcade games for Nintendo DS. You have the choice between a breakout, a puzzle game and a shoot'em up to try and get the high-score.

game.name: Roary : La Voiture de Course
game.desc: Aimed at a young audience, Roary: The Race Car is the adaptation of the eponymous animated series on Nintendo DS. There are several musical and arcade mini-games, but also challenges that call on your logic and your reflexes.

game.name: Runaway : The Dream of the Turtle
game.desc: At the end of Runaway Brian and Gina finally had the time to be together on a tropical island called Mala, but the good times don't last long. One day they decide to go on a trip and fly over the island in a plane. Everything goes well until the engines s

game.name: Science Papa
game.desc: As the newest member of Science Papas renowned research team, explore chemistry, physics, paleontology, and biology as you play over 40 experiments. Compete against rival scientists in heated competitions to win records, unlock new lab equipment, and become the worlds most renown scientist!

game.name: Secret Files 2 : Puritas Cordis
game.desc: The world is on the brink of disaster. By the time Nina Kalenkow realizes that the recent catastrophes were caused not by nature, but by an unscrupulous secret society known as Puritas Cordis, it is almost too late. While her ex-boyfriend Max, a scientist, witnesses the brutal methods of Puritas Cordis at the excavation site of an ancient Indonesian temple complex, Nina joins forces with a priest in France to investigate the connection between the secret society's sinister prophesies and the creepy leader of an ancient order. A dramatic race against time begins. Will the protagonists be able to avert the impending apocalypse?

game.name: Secrets of the Titanic 1912-2012
game.desc: Join Eva and her family as they take a cruise on a ship following the same path as the ill-fated Titanic. After wearing her grandmother's necklace, Eva starts to experience flashbacks and finds herself onboard the Titanic, not as herself, but as her beloved grandmother. Should she try and stop the Titanic from colliding with the iceberg and change the course of history forever? And, if she does prevent the disaster, what impact does it have on the future and ultimately the safety of her own family? Test your hidden-object and logic skills in this tense and exciting adventure game!

game.name: Settlement : Colossus
game.desc: Build an empire out of its grass hut roots in Settlement - Colossus! Take the role of a 300-year old emperor cursed to live without his true love until he appeases his god for a grievous offense. Gather resources, research new tools and build bigger and better accommodations as you care for your people and attract new citizens to your fold.

game.name: Shaun the Sheep : Off His Head
game.desc: In Shaun the Sheep: Off His Head the farmer is all set for a big date, but wait....the farmer's new toupee has gone missing! Players must help Shaun find the farmer's toupee before it's too late. Gamers will play as Shaun and call upon other favorite characters from the show, such as Shirley, Timmy, Bitzer and more, as they help Shaun escape the naughty pigs and other mischievous animals in a bid to rescue the missing toupee!

game.name: Sightseeing Puzzle - Echter Puzzlespass fuer Unter
game.desc: Puzzle Sightseeing is the jigsaw puzzle for on the move. Puzzle together the most beautiful motifs wherever and whenever you like. Collect stars for each completed jigsaw puzzle and unlock new images. Each motif is available in three different degrees of difficulty. Would you rather decide yourself on the images you wish to puzzle together? No problem! Its also allows you to puzzle together all the images from the photo album of your Nintendo DSi.

game.name: Sims 2, The - Apartment Pets
game.desc:
In The Sims 2: Apartment Pets, you're living in your Uncle Bill's apartment. He gave the permission to change any of his furniture, so, you're now spending your money to customize your new home. But you're not only doing that. From time to time, your neighbours are dropping one of their pets for you or the janitor is giving you an animal found in the dumpster. It's up to you to train them.
The game is featuring the Sims trademark gameplay. You have to satisfy your Sim's daily needs, here reduced to four: Hunger, Comfort, Social and Bladder. You can also create your own character and change the interior of the apartment by upgrading items. You can also work at the local pet spa.
You also have to take care of the pets entrusted to you. When you have an animal, you have to feed it, train it, bath it, dress it and when it's ready for a new life, it's taken away in order for you to get a new pet to care.

game.name: So Blonde : Retour sur l'Ile
game.desc:
Blonde teenage girl Sunny from So Blonde is back. Back to the Island tells an alternate storyline proposing the spoiled brat was washed up at the dark side of pirate infested Forgotten Island instead of the friendly shore she started at in the original game. Though the plot around the mysterious curse persists and a lot of incidents are quite the same, the story develops in a different way and reveals new characters.
The classic adventure stays true to its predecessor featuring lots of inventory- or environment-based item puzzles and optional mini-games.

game.name: Solitaire Ds
game.desc: If you find that the game of Solitaire on your PC is outdated, go up a gear with Solitaire DS. The version of the Nintendo DS does not offer 1 or 2 but 101 variations of the famous card game. It is also possible to play up to 5 simultaneously with a single cartridge via the download system.

game.name: Space Invaders Extreme 2
game.desc: Space Invaders Extreme 2 follows in the footsteps of last year's critically acclaimed Space Invaders Extreme, which was regarded by many as the best remake of the original classic. This year the iconic Invaders are back again and this time the action is even more extreme! The game combines the essence of the original game with a stunning alliance of futuristic graphic design and cutting-edge audio, overhauled gameplay and a whole new range of amazing power-ups.

game.name: Spider-Man 2
game.desc: A pseudo 3D (game is played on a 2D plane, but the stages will rotate around Spider-Man at certain points) beat-em-up/adventure game. Vicarious Visions' first title on the Nintendo DS, the game puts the player into the role of Peter Parker (AKA Spider-Man) playing through various missions with varying objectives and pitting him against the likes of Mysterio, The Vulture, and the main villain, Doctor Octavius. The missions themselves vary from missions requiring you to find all hostages to bomb defusal missions and fast paced boss battles.

game.name: Spider-Man 3
game.desc:
Based off the 2007 movie of the same name, Spider-Man 3 puts players in charge of the titular hero as he tries to once again New York City safe from the combined menace of the New Goblin, the Sandman, and Venom.
This version of the game is a 2D side-scrolling platformer with 3D stylized elements. The action is primarily controlled using the touch screen. Players use the stylus for combat, webbing, and item interaction. The game also allows for players to adventure in storylines not explored in the third film, such as facing familiar Spider-Man villains from the comic book mythos.
One of the main focal points of the new game is the inclusion of Spider-Man's black symbiote costume. When Spider-Man's "Rage" meter builds up, the black suit automatically takes over, allowing Spider-Man to become faster, aggressive, and more powerful.

game.name: SpongeBob's Truth or Square
game.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants has gotten himself into quite a predicament. After being entrusted by Mr. Krabs to keep the Krabby Patty formula safe, he is overcome with grief for losing the recipe. He then relies on the help of the most unlikely companion, Plankton, who wants the secret Krabby Patty recipe to himself. With the help of his friend, SpongeBob must use Plankton's memory machine to retrace the happiest moments of his life to find the Krabby Patty formula in time for the Krusty Krab's Eleventy Seventh anniversary.

game.name: Star Wars - Lethal Alliance
game.desc: Combine the elite weaponry and acrobatic skills of Rianna with the multifunctional defensive and slicing support of Zeeo to create a formidable team. Only by working together can you complete perilous missions and ultimately steal the plans for the Death Star. From the chaotic planet of Coruscant to the dusty, dangerous alleys of Mos Eisley, Rianna and Zeeo must use an arsenal of tricks to complete their mission. Set up holographic disguises to fool Imperial guards, commandeer gun turrets, master death-defying flying escapes and battle carnivorous beasts. First original Star Wars game built exclusively for handhelds: Multiplayer modes enhance collaborative gameplay while taking advantage of the unique capabilities of both the PSP system and Nintendo DS. Your mission takes you to classic destinations such as the Death Star and Tatooine, and allows you to discover never-before-seen locations on Despayre, Danuta and Alderaan. Each new environment offers encounters with unforgettable Star Wars characters and species, including Boba Fett, Kyle Katarn, Princess Leia Organa, Darth Vader, Imperial officers, Rodians, Quarren and stormtroopers.

game.path: ./Star Wars - The Clone Wars - Jedi Alliance (USA).zip
game.name: Star Wars : The Clone Wars : Jedi Alliance
game.desc: Now everyone can experience the fun and excitement of a Lightsaber fight. Star Wars The Clone Wars: Lightsaber Duels and Star Wars® The Clone Wars: Jedi Alliance immerses you in the characters, locations, and epic duels from the all-new Star Wars animated feature film and television series set between Episode II and Episode III.
game.image: ./media/screenshot/Star Wars - The Clone Wars - Jedi Alliance (USA).png

game.path: ./Star Wars - The Clone Wars - Republic Heroes (Europe).zip
game.name: Star Wars - The Clone Wars - Republic Heroes
game.desc: Star Wars The Clone Wars: Republic Heroes lets Star Wars fans young and old live out the sweeping galactic adventures of the Clone Wars. For the first time ever, players can fight as their favorite Jedi and clone troopers from the preeminent animated television series – from familiar faces like Anakin Skywalker to new heroes like Clone Captain Rex. A brand-new storyline, which bridges the gap between season one and two, takes the player on a multi-faceted adventure to stop a mysterious techno assassin's destructive plot. Built around two-player cooperative action, the accessible controls and family-friendly gameplay bring Star Wars fans across generations together like never before to fight the evil Separatists and restore peace to the galaxy. Experience an all-new and exciting Clone Wars storyline that bridges the gap between season one and two of the TV series as you learn more about the mysterious bounty hunter Cad Bane and hunt down the all-new Skakoan super villain Kul Teska.
game.image: ./media/screenshot/Star Wars - The Clone Wars - Republic Heroes (Europe).png

game.name: Star Wars - The Force Unleashed
game.desc: The Star Wars saga continues in Star Wars: The Force Unleashed. You are Darth Vader's Secret Apprentice! The Dark Lord of the Sith himself has trained you to use a lightsaber and unleash the power of the Force, but now your destiny is your own. Will you join Vader as the next great Sith, or will you choose to defend peace and justice as a noble Jedi Knight?

game.name: Star Wars - The Force Unleashed II
game.desc: Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II is an action game for DS / DSi and sequel to 2008's Star Wars: The Force Unleashed. Following a unique storyline revolving around Darth Vader's secret apprentice, that parallels the events of Star Wars: Episode III and Episode IV, The Force Unleashed II revels in addictive and over-the-top Force-based gameplay powers which include those seen in the first game as well as new powerful additions like Force Fury and the Jedi Mind Trick. Additional features include dual-wielded light sabers, increased puzzle-solving gameplay, expanded customization and all-new combo attacks.

game.path: ./Star Wars Episode III - Revenge of the Sith (USA).zip
game.name: Star Wars Episode III: Revenge of the Sith
game.desc: Based on the third episode of the Star Wars trilogy, Star Wars Episode III: Revenge of the Sith promises an authentic Jedi experience. The third-person action game follows Anakin Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi as they fight enemies, learn new skills, and pull off combo moves. In multiplayer duels, you can fight against Darth Vader and other challenging enemies.
game.image: ./media/screenshot/Star Wars Episode III - Revenge of the Sith (USA).png

game.name: 桌上足球
game.desc: Subbuteo for Nintendo DS is the official game of the famous board game of the same name. All the rules are present and a full tutorial can teach you them as needed. It is possible to direct your players with a stylus but also with your finger! Three game modes are present: Free, Championship and Tournament. It is also possible to play in pairs, via the console's Wi-Fi connection.

game.name: Super Mario 64 DS
game.desc:
Mario, Luigi, and Wario have all gone to the Mushroom Palace for some of Princess Peach's famous home made cake. However, when they don't return its up to the heroic dino Yoshi to find out what's wrong.
In this portable remake of the original Super Mario 64 You' are able to play as different characters from the Mario franchise. Wario, Yoshi, Luigi, and of course Mario. Each character has different abilities to be made use of during the games expanded quest.
The game now features 150 Stars to collect up from the previous 120, new stages with new bosses, changes to old stages and bosses, and a multiplayer in which player compete to get the most stars.
The game also includes over two dozen mini games that make use of both screens and the touch pad.
The DS touch screen can be used to mimic analog control.

game.name: Super Princess Peach
game.desc:
For once, Bowser has changed his tactics. Instead of grabbing the Princess every chance he gets, he's gone straight to the source of all his problems this time around. The two people who always get in his way and halt his chances of owning Mushroom Kingdom all himself. Mario and Luigi are suddenly whisked away, and only one person can save them...
Princess Peach, always the one in distress, will use all her unique abilities and items to travel the length of the Kingdom to save her heroes. Her main attack uses a parasol on enemies, which can also double as the perfect way to float down from the heights.
Princess Peachs' emotions will also come into play. Make her cry to drench enemies or help plants grow to reach higher ground, meanwhile her happy singing can distract many foes and open up further areas.

game.name: Tales To Enjoy Puss In Boots

game.path: ./Tales to Enjoy! - The Three Little Pigs (Europe).zip
game.name: Tales To Enjoy! - The Three Little Pigs
game.image: ./media/screenshot/Tales to Enjoy! - The Three Little Pigs (Europe).png

game.name: Tales To Enjoy! - The Ugly Duckling
The Lost Treasures of Alexandria
game.desc: The Lost Treasures of Alexandria is a puzzle game for Nintendo DS that invites you to overcome 200 challenges across 10 distinct environments. Your character, a young archaeologist, will have to form groups of three or more colored spheres to achieve various objectives. A few game variants, special spheres but also alternative tables and special powers have many surprises in store for you.

game.path: ./Think - Training fuer den Kopf - Sinnes Trainer (Europe).zip
game.name: Think - Training fuer den Kopf - Logik Trainer
game.desc:
Think outside the box and improve your mental fitness! This original brain training programme helps players develop a wide range of thinking skills in imaginative and creative ways.
- Six different training categories, three levels of difficultynn- Language, Memory, Mathematics, Spatial Reasoning, Grasp, Logicnn- Single player, Multiplayer, free trainingnn- Individual training schedule and progress documentationnn- Advanced handwriting recognitionnn- The wily old professor provides coaching and extra motivatio
nFeaturing: Sprint, Marathon, Olympic and Multiplayer Modes of play... who's got the highest Think Quotient?
game.image: ./media/screenshot/Think - Training fuer den Kopf - Sinnes Trainer (Europe).jpg

game.name: Thrillville - Off The Rails
game.desc: Thrillville: Off the Rails "lifts" up the family-friendly mix of gameplay from Thrillville with some of the most wildly creative roller-coaster concepts ever imagined, as well as new ways to communicate with park guests and a vast array of carnival games. Off the Rails lives up to its name with 20 death-defying rides so outrageous, they inspire the same word from every park visitor who sees them: "WHOA!" Build these incredible "WHOA Coasters" to leap from one track to another, launch through the air like cannonballs, blast through a burning rings of fire, and much, much more.

game.name: Pokémon: Black Version 2
game.desc:
Made for Nintendo DS, this game is a sequel to the fifth generation of Pokemon games, known as Pokemon Black & Pokemon White.
Return to the captivating Unova region two years after the events of the original Pokemon Black Version and Pokemon White Version games -- the first time in the core Pokemon game series that a storyline has continued from one game to another. Players can explore new areas, discover Gyms with new leaders and see how everything has changed in the last two years.

game.name: Real Stories - Passion 4 Fashion
game.desc: Real Stories : Fashionshop sur Nintendo DS transforme la joueuse en patronne de boutique fashion à New-York. Il faudra relooker les demoiselles en quête de la tenue ultime pour leurs soirées mondaines. Vous pourrez décider de leur look en piochant parmi 1600 vêtements et accessoires, et trouver la coiffure, le maquillage et la manucure appropriée.

game.name: Runaway : A Twist of Fate
game.desc: Brian and Gina are back in a new adventure, a bit darker than the previous one but still loaded with an omnipresent humor and based on a production worth a big 2D animation film. For the first time in Runaway history, you will take the control of Brian but also of his girlfriend, Gina! Following the story line of the previous episode, A Twist of Fate is also an independent new adventure that players who have never played Runaway before will fully enjoy.

game.name: Secret Flirts
game.desc: Let all adolescent girls in search of love reassure themselves, Secret Flirts is the DS game that will allow them to meet the chosen one of their heart. Several activities await them to simulate everyday life including going out with girlfriends, trips to the shops or, of course, meeting the boys.

game.name: Sokoban DS
game.desc:
Sokoban DS is a modern take on the classic Soko-Ban, first launched in Japan in 1982. Known as a maze-based transport puzzle game, the player has to move a number of boxes to designated positions on the map. Because of the limited movement possibilities and various obstacles this job requires logic to achieve the goal.
The Sokoban DS version contains a total of 250 levels of varying difficulty and has full usage of DS 3D graphics, that allows free panning and zooming within levels. For begiiners the basic game mechanics are explained in an included tutorial. It also includes an undo/redo function, individual characters and replays.

game.name: Star Wars Battlefront : Elite Squadron
game.desc: X1 and X2 are twin brothers, both clone troopers created from the DNA of a Jedi Master. They fought together against the Separatist movement during the Clone Wars, but are now on opposing sides during the Galactic Civil War. X2 regrets his part in the execution of Order 66, the killing of his former commander, Jedi Master Ferroda. He turned his back at the Empire and, after hiding out for a while, joined the Rebel Alliance. His brother, an Imperial Officer, is now trying to hunt him down for his desertion.

game.name: Stratego Next Edition
game.desc: In Stratego: Next Edition you must demonstrate your strategic skills on the battlefield. Stratego' s unique game play pits you against opponents who will do everything in their power to outsmart you. Rise to the challenge and confront them in battle. Emerge victorious and you'll become the greatest general of all time. You can also play Stratego: Next Edition wirelessly against a friend who also owns a Nintendo DSi or Nintendo 3DS system and has a copy of the game. Do you have the strength to endure these challenges and be the first to capture the flag?

game.path: ./Tales to Enjoy! - Little Red Riding Hood (Europe).zip
game.name: Tales To Enjoy Little Red Riding Hood
game.image: ./media/screenshot/Tales to Enjoy! - Little Red Riding Hood (Europe).png

game.name: Tierbabys Puzzle - Echter Puzzlespass fuer Unterwe
Winx Club - Your Magic Universe
game.desc: Winx Club : Ton Univers Magique sur DS est un jeu incluant un ensemble de fonctionnalités telles qu'un journal intime, des mini-jeux (puzzle, jeux de rythme, coloriage, quiz) et un agenda. Le jeu inclut également une fonctionnalité "chat" avec laquelle les filles peuvent constituer une liste de contacts et les appeler avec une connexion wi-fi.

game.path: ./Youda Legend - The Golden Bird of Paradise (Europe).zip
game.name: Youda Legend - The Curse Of The Amsterdam Diamond
game.image: ./media/screenshot/Youda Legend - The Golden Bird of Paradise (Europe).png

game.name: Tim Stockdale's Riding Star
game.desc: Compete head to head against friends or the computer in your quest to become the Riding Star with the most realistic equestrian simulation available for Nintendo DS. Keep your horse well fed and groomed and compete in dressage, cross-country and show jumping in a variety of stadiums and courses. Compete in Career, Single-Player and Hot-seat Mode, with an in-depth tutorial covering every aspect of the game, from grooming to jumping.

game.name: Titeuf : Mission Nadia
game.desc: Titeuf is trying to win the affections of a girl at his school called Nadia. In order to do this the player must help Titeuf complete a series of tasks in the form of mini games. These are accessed by wondering around the town and speaking to friends and family who offer clues as to the location of the next challenge.

game.name: Totally Spies! : My Secret Diary
game.desc: Totally spies! : My Secret Agenda is an electronic secret agenda for Nintendo DS. Find the Spies who give you new tips every day to feel good about yourself. Protected by a password, you will be able to confide in the Totally Spies, write all your secrets and take them everywhere. Also write down all the information about your friends and their contact details, you can even chat with them!

game.name: Totally Spies! 3 - Secret Agents
game.desc:
Alex, Clover and Sam won't keep any secrets from you.
Your three favorite Spies are back in all new exciting missions! They will have to use their special abilities to help Jerry and the Woohp defeat the Bad Guys!
- Choose the spy you want to embody and embark on perilous secret adventures! - Pick the right disguise and investigate undercover to expose Bad Guys' plans!

game.name: Totally Spies! 4 - Around The World
game.desc: Totally Spies! 4: Around the World on Nintendo DS offers a new adventure in the universe of the series. With the help of spies Alex, Clover and Sam, players will go in pursuit of a great master of burglary. Interviewing witnesses, hiding, finding clues through gadgets... so many missions that will solve the Shandalama riddle.

game.name: Transformers Animated : Le Jeu
game.desc: Transformers Animated: The Game delivers an exciting action-adventure experience. As they blast through Decepticon-controlled hoverbots, players must solve challenging team-building puzzles and race through futuristic Detroit roadways, dodging on-coming traffic while seamlessly morphing between robot and vehicle form. Fans take control of all their favorite Autobot characters, including Optimus Prime, Bumblebee, Bulkhead and Prowl, as they work together to reclaim the lost fragments of the Allspark before the Decepticons intercept it and claim Cybertron as their own.

game.name: Travel Coach : Europe 1
game.desc: Travel Coach: Europe 1 on DS offers you advanced language functions for 5 languages such as dictionary, various quotes and proverbs, a language coach as well as a lot of additional information about the countries. Mini-games typical of each country are also present. Travel Coach is the ideal tool for your trips to Europe.

game.name: Jewels of the Tropical Lost Island
game.desc: Match 3 game wrapped in a story of a search for treasure among the Caribbean islands, battling sea monsters and pirates.

game.name: Tsumiki - The Infernal Tower
game.desc: Tout droit venu du Japon, le concept de Tsumiki consiste à construire la tour la plus haute et solide possible en assemblant les pièces qui tombent du ciel. Plusieurs modes de jeu viennent pimenter les parties de ce puzzle-game sur DS et notamment un mode 4 joueurs sur la même cartouche. Tous les coups sont alors permis pour déstabiliser les adversaires et faire chuter leurs constructions.

game.name: Underwater Puzzle - Echter Puzzlespass Fuer Unterwegs
Vicky - The Viking
game.desc: Wickie is a young Viking boy of about 10 years of age. He is more clever and sharp-witted than anyone else in his home village of Flake and thus often saves the day. In this game the men of Flake have been captured while on a mission; once again it is up to Wickie to come up with a rescue plan. The game is a classic platform game. Wickie carries a slingshot, but that is not enough to defeat the more powerful enemies. Instead, he must rely on tricks and traps such as pushing boulders towards enemy patrols. There are five different game worlds that lead Wickie into different corners of Europe. Short cut scenes with the characters from the animated series tell the story in-between the levels. There are also some very simple mini games such as lock picking or connect the numbers.

game.name: Vicky - The Viking
game.desc: Wickie is a young Viking boy of about 10 years of age. He is more clever and sharp-witted than anyone else in his home village of Flake and thus often saves the day. In this game the men of Flake have been captured while on a mission; once again it is up to Wickie to come up with a rescue plan. The game is a classic platform game. Wickie carries a slingshot, but that is not enough to defeat the more powerful enemies. Instead, he must rely on tricks and traps such as pushing boulders towards enemy patrols. There are five different game worlds that lead Wickie into different corners of Europe. Short cut scenes with the characters from the animated series tell the story in-between the levels. There are also some very simple mini games such as lock picking or connect the numbers.

game.name: Visual Logic Training
game.desc: Visual Logic Training is a DS brain trainer aimed at improving our memory and logic. Through twenty exercises, players will be able to strengthen their intellectual capacities and compare their performances with other players around the world, thanks to the wireless connectivity.

game.name: Was ist Was : The Earth Adventure

game.path: ./Was Ist Was - Versunkene Schaetze - Das Abenteuerspiel (Europe) (En,De).zip
game.name: Was Ist Was - Versunkene Schaetze - Das Abenteuers

game.name: The Water Horse - Legend Of The Deep
Who Wants to Be a Millionaire
game.desc:
Put Yourself In The Millionaire Hot Seat
With Chris Tarrant giving instructions, use the Wii Remote and climb the money tree
Experience all the TV show's best assets and live the tension of answering 2000 questions
Choose your lifelines carefully: Will you trust the audience or will you risk the 50:50?
Challenge one of your friends to win a virtual million pounds and show off your knowledge!

game.path: ./Who Wants To Be A Millionaire - 2nd Edition (Europe).zip
game.name: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire - 2nd Edition
game.desc: Nimm mit deinem Nintendo DS an der bekanntesten TV-Show der Welt teil. Trainiere dir Wissen an, wähle deine Lieblingskategorie und erhalte auf dem Weg zur Million auf dich zugeschnittene Fragen. Erstelle dein eigenes Profil und beantworte Fragen, die sich mit deiner Lieblingskategorie beschäftigen. Wähle dein Fachgebiet, um dem Glück etwas nachzuhelfen. Entscheide dich zwischen Unterhaltung, Allgemeinbildung und Sport. Übe ohne Druck im Trainings-Modus, wie du zum virtuellen Millionär werden kannst.
game.image: ./media/screenshot/Who Wants To Be A Millionaire - 2nd Edition (Europe).png

game.path: ./Willkommen in der Steinzeit - Ueberleben Ist Alles! (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).zip
game.name: Willkommen In Der Steinzeit - Ueberleben Ist Alles!
game.image: ./media/screenshot/Willkommen in der Steinzeit - Ueberleben Ist Alles! (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).png

game.name: Winx Club : Believix in You
game.desc: Winx Club: Believix in You for Nintendo DS is a game based on the 4th season of the series. The title includes 16 missions as well as 18 mini-games, all of which lead you to save the world from darkness! Finally, note that the title has a multiplayer mode that can accommodate 3 of your friends.

game.name: Winx Club Rockstars
game.desc: Winx Club Rockstars is a musical game for the Nintendo DS based on the famous TV series. Players will perform on stage by singing or using one of the available instruments (guitar, keyboard, drums ...). Throughout the adventure, they can unlock many bonuses to customize their characters.

game.name: Witches & Vampires - The Secrets of Ashburry
game.desc:
Three supernatural siblings work together to fight demons and vampires in this role-playing game from Conspiracy Entertainment. Play as witch Aluna, vampire Dariel, and half-blood Ruby as they search the village of Ashburry for the six mystical amulets needed to stop the evil creatures. Players can interact with townsfolk to receive quests and venture into dungeons to hunt for treasure and clues to the missing amulets. The touch-screen interface is used to perform actions such as casting spells, digging for treasure, and more. Also included are various mini-games, such as flying on a broomstick through a series of floating rings.
- Play as three magical characters with distinct abilities. - Use the touch-screen interface to cast magic, create potions, fly on a broomstick, and more. - Complete quests and explore mysterious dungeons to find the missing amulets.

game.name: World Cup of Pool
game.desc:
When you want to be the best you have to beat the best. This means taking on and defeating Earl "the Pearl" Strickland, Efren Reyes, Francisco Bustamante, Ronnie O'Sullivan and current World Champion Daryll Peach - and that's just what you can do in World Cup of Pool!
Featuring over 60 of the world's top players - with over 15 Pool and Snooker world titles between them - prove you're a winner at 8-ball & 9-ball and claim the ultimate prize in any sport - the World Cup.

game.name: World Snooker Championship Season 2007-08
game.desc: Play against 96 top ranked players in the world in nine officially approved tournaments. The cartridge allows you to take up to 24 challenges to unlock by progressing in the championship mode. Become a pro thanks to the intuitive maneuverability of the stylus.

game.path: ./Youda Legend - The Curse Of The Amsterdam Diamond (Europe).zip
game.name: Youda Legend - The Curse Of The Amsterdam Diamond
game.image: ./media/screenshot/Youda Legend - The Curse Of The Amsterdam Diamond (Europe).png

game.name: Youda Safari
game.desc: Youda Safari est un jeux de gestion du temps qui mettra les joueurs en charge des parcs naturels successifs à travers le monde, donnant aux gestionnaires en herbe la mission de développer attentivement chaque parc pour en faire des destinations spectaculaires qui attirent des foules croissantes de visiteurs virtuels à mesure qu'ils grandissent. Sur Youda Safari, les joueurs jouent le rôle de Lucy, une directrice des relations publiques et du marketing entreprenante, qui a accepté d'aider son amie à gérer des parcs de safari dans de nombreux endroits et continents, notamment aux Etats-Unis, en Europe, en Russie, en Afrique, en Chine et au Brésil. Les joueurs doivent combiner la gestion du temps et la prise de décision sage pour s'assurer que les visiteurs enthousiastes et les touristes passionnés d'animaux ont les meilleurs itinéraires possibles pour voir leurs animaux préférés et prendre quelques photos. Au fur et à mesure que les joueurs progresseront, ils devront décider comment améliorer chaque parc, que ce soit en y ajoutant de nouvelles attractions animales et des véhicules de tourisme, ou en construisant des installations touristiques plus grandes et plus de restaurants. Les futurs propriétaires de parcs devront peaufiner chaque parc pour offrir les meilleures excursions et aventures de la faune s'ils veulent que leurs clients reviennent.

game.name: Ys Strategy
game.desc:
A game destined to become the real-time strategy benchmark title on Nintendo DS. Ys Strategy contains charismatic and absorbing heroes and heroines in a beautiful fantasy world. Fight for supremacy by managing resources, building units and choosing the right strategy for real-time battles at the same time as managing and giving orders to all of your troops.
The most in-depth storyline on the Nintendo DS - almost a novel's worth of narrative
An addictive battle system and map generator in Single Mode guarantees addictive gameplay
Anticipate your opponent's next move and develop an appropriate strategy
Includes a tutorial and a Help function to aid players not used to RTS games!

game.name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters GX Card Almanac
game.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! GX Card Almanac is a card database video game released for the Nintendo DS in Japanese, English, French, German , Italian and Spanish. Its first English release was in Australia on the 30th November 2007. It is not actually a game, but a detailed catalog of all cards released in the TCG or OCG up until Strike of Neos. It also includes tools to aide in real-life gameplay (Life Point calculator, virtual dice roll and virtual coin flip).

game.name: Zarah - Das Schloss Des Gwoor
game.desc: Intuitive control with the stylus and screen. Solve many tricky puzzles and help Zarah thwart Gwoor's plans. The various elements make this title both an adventurous role-playing game and an exciting simulation. Save the magic forest and take care of the loving farm of Zarah's uncle. Free the 3 unicorn foals and experience an adventurous adventure with Zarah and her unicorn.

game.name: Zhu Zhu Princess
game.desc: Help Princess Snowcup find her way to Prince Dashington's castle! Dress up, feed and explore with Snowcup, Patches, NumNums, Pipsqueak, Jilly, Nugget, Peachy, Pinky and Dashington! Throughout your journey, you will encounter jumps, slides, tunnels and more!

game.name: Zoo Quest - Puzzle Fun!
game.desc: Race against the clock as you try to stop the zoo's animals from becoming extinct! Challenge your wits and reflexes as you advance through 20 exciting levels of puzzling gameplay. With three difficulty modes, Australia Zoo Quest cranks up the fun factor, providing you with hours of additional gameplay that will keep you coming back for more!

game.name: 100 Classic Games
game.desc: You will never get bored with this collection; Whether you want to play a quick, challenging game or knuckle-whitening adventure for an entire evening,there is something for everyone. Simply start, select,and begin playing: 100 brain-exercising games, Sudoku,popular Board Games such as Chess, Checkers, Backgammon, Puzzle Games and well known Card Games like Texas Hold'em Poker.The intuitive control with the stylus and the step-by-step demonstrations make getting used to this fantastic game a breeze.

game.name: Animal Life - Australia
game.desc: In Animal Life: Australia you wil take a fascinating journey ino the land of Kangaroos and Koalas. Along your way you will get to learn many interesting facts about the animal kingdom, solve tricky puzzles and play exciting games. The more you learn the more the puzzles and animals you will get to see. Collect all the stars to become a real pro in the field of Australia research!

game.path: ./2 in 1 - Mahjong + Mahjong Around the World (Europe).zip
game.name: 2 In 1 - Mahjong Mahjong Around The World
game.image: ./media/screenshot/2 in 1 - Mahjong + Mahjong Around the World (Europe).png

game.name: Arthur and the Revenge of Maltazard
game.desc: Arthur et la Vengeance de Maltazard on DS is a party game inspired by the second part of the saga of Luc Besson Arthur and the Minimoys. It offers around thirty mini-games in which the players are not in competition but must on the contrary cooperate to achieve the best possible score.

game.name: 搖滾樂團英雄
game.desc: Brought to you by the makers of Guitar Hero, one of the best-selling video game franchises of all time, Band Hero features the hottest chart-topping hits from everyone's favorite bands including No Doubt, Nelly Furtado, Lily Allen, The All-American Rejects and Jackson 5. Headlined by some of the leading names in music as in-game artists and playable characters, including singer, songwriter and guitarist Taylor Swift and Maroon 5 frontman Adam Levine, Band Hero is the ultimate party game where friends and family can choose to join the band or take five at any time without interrupting the performance, in Party Play mode. Band Hero allows fans to create the band of their dreams, using any combination of vocals and guitar or drum controllers, providing budding pop stars the chance to customize how they interact with and experience their favorite music.
